title: A Magical Pillow
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Kanata-san, you left your favorite pillow outside<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, Kanata left it to bask in the sunlight, Kanata forgot~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Geez, it’s a good thing I noticed, even though you let it get a lot of sunshine if you left it out until dusk it would’ve gotten damp<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, even if Kanata forgets, Shizuku-chan will save Kanata’s pillow, so it’s okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>*sigh*, Kanata-san, you….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hey, hey, how does a sunbathed pillow feel? Fluffy? Does it feel good? Try it for a bit~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>….It is fluffy. And it does feel good<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s freshly dried, so it smells like the sun, right~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You’re right, it does smell like the sun…. zzz….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufu. It must be tiring to juggle both this and the drama club. Sleep well, Shizuku-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
